info.title: UiTdatabank v3
info.description:
Version 3 of the UiTdatabank, a central database of cultural offers in the Flanders region.

 Most operations require that you authenticate first with your UiTID.

tags.name: Offer
tags.description: Operations related to all offer types.

get.summary: Retrieve all information about the authenticated user.

200.description: The information available about the authenticated user.

401.description: Authentication with UiTID and a valid JWT is required.

get.summary: Retrieve all offers for the current user

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The number of the page which the paged result should return

401.description: Authentication with UiTID and a valid JWT is required.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: An object containing the necessary information to create a new cultural event.

mainLanguage.description: The unique ISO 639-1 2 character language code.

name.description: The name of the event to create

type.description: One of the event types available at: http://taxonomy.uitdatabank.be/api/domain/eventtype/classification

theme.description: One of the available themes from http://taxonomy.uitdatabank.be/api/domain/theme/classification

domain.description: This is hardcoded to 'thema' in the current application. It is passed to the API and then overwritten.

addressCountry.description: The country code of the location.

addressLocality.description: The locality name of the location.

streetAddress.description: The street name and number information of the location.

eventId.description: The unique identifier of the cultural event.

url.description: The URL of the cultural event.

401.description: Authentication with UiTID and a valid JWT is required.

get.summary: View the details of a specific cultural event.

parameters.name: cdbId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of an offer. The uuid of older items will deviate from the format specification.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: An object containing the necessary information to create a new place.

mainLanguage.description: The unique ISO 639-1 2 character language code.

name.description: The name of the place to create

type.description: One of the types available at: http://taxonomy.uitdatabank.be/api/domain/eventtype/classification (for both events and places)

addressCountry.description: The country code of the location.

addressLocality.description: The locality name of the location.

streetAddress.description: The street name and number information of the location.

placeId.description: The unique identifier of the place.

401.description: Authentication with UiTID and a valid JWT is required.

parameters.name: postalCode
parameters.description: Limit the list to places located in the area with this postal code.

parameters.name: embed
parameters.description: Whether to get the actual bodies of the results

200.description: A PagedCollection of places matching the supplied criteria.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the organizer to be used for fuzzy search

parameters.name: website
parameters.description: The url of the organizer website

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The limit of organizers included in the result set. When omitted it defaults to 30 items.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The number of organizers to skip from the start of the result set.

parameters.name: embed
parameters.description: Whether to get the actual bodies of the results

200.description: A PagedCollection of organizers matching the supplied criteria.
